snippet.title: The Operator Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
A new trailer for The Operator showcased how players will dig for clues and solve improbable cases from behind a computer screen. The gumshoe puzzler is coming to PC in 2024.
https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #theoperator #operator
